Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Darrell Self

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Mario Santora
Dear Sir,
Mario Santora shouldn't play at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .214 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Jack Messer
Dear Sir,
Jack Messer has an ERA of 2.78 at A Peoria Chiefs!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Joseph Viveiros
Dear Sir,
Joseph Viveiros isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .236, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
